DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare effectiveness single dose tin mesoporphyrin special blue light phototherapy control hyperbilirubinemia premature newborn Greece . II . Evaluate dose tin mesoporphyrin sufficient alleviate need phototherapy without adverse effect newborn .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Tin Mesoporphyrin v Phototherapy Hyperbilirubinemia Premature Newborns
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients randomly assign clinical group within 96 hour birth . Patients stratify gestational age , clinical status , age treatment . One group receive tin mesoporphyrin . Patients cross phototherapy plasma bilirubin concentration reach treatment threshold . The second group receive phototherapy Special Blue fluorescent lamps least 24 hour . Patients receive second phototherapy course plasma bilirubin concentration reach treatment threshold within 24 hour first course .
